ayas.arabic: كٓهيعٓصٓ
ayas.translation: Kaf Ha Ya Ain Suad.
ayas.transliteration: kāf hā yā 'in ṣād

ayas.arabic: ذِكْرُ رَحْمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبْدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
ayas.translation: A mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zakariya.
ayas.transliteration: dhikru raḥmati rabbika `abdahu zakariyyā

ayas.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيًّا
ayas.translation: When he called upon his Lord in a low voice,
ayas.transliteration: idh nādā rabbahu nidā-an khafiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: My Lord! surely my bones are weakened and my head flares with hoariness, and, my Lord! I have never been unsuccessful in my prayer to Thee:
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī wahanal `aẓmu minnī washta`alar ra-su shayban walam akun bidu`ā-ika rabbi shaqiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّا
ayas.translation: And surely I fear my cousins after me, and my wife is barren, therefore grant me from Thyself an heir,
ayas.transliteration: wa innī khiftul mawāliya min warā-ī wakānatim-ra-atī `āqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyā

ayas.arabic: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا
ayas.translation: Who should inherit me and inherit from the children of Yaqoub, and make him, my Lord, one in whom Thou art well pleased.
ayas.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli ya`qūb ۖ waj`alhu rabbi raḍiyyā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا
ayas.translation: O Zakariya! surely We give you good news of a boy whose name shall be Yahya: We have not made before anyone his equal.
ayas.transliteration: yāzakariyyā innā nubashhiruka bighulāminis-muhu yaḥyā lam naj`al lahu min qablu samiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: O my Lord! when shall I have a son, and my wife is barren, and I myself have reached indeed the extreme degree of old age?
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun wakānatim-ra-atī `āqiran waqad balaghtu minal kibari `itiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًٔا
ayas.translation: He said: So shall it be, your Lord says: It is easy to Me, and indeed I created you before, when you were nothing.
ayas.transliteration: qāla kadhālika qāla rabbuka huwa `alayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shay-ā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةً ۚ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍ سَوِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: My Lord! give me a sign. He said: Your sign is that you will not be able to speak to the people three nights while in sound health.
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbij-`al lī āyah ۚ qāla āyatuka allā tukalliman nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
ayas.translation: So he went forth to his people from his place of worship, then he made known to them that they should glorify (Allah) morning and evening.
ayas.transliteration: fakharaja `alā qawmihi minal miḥrābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū bukratan wa`ashiyyā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا
ayas.translation: O Yahya! take hold of the Book with strength, and We granted him wisdom while yet a child
ayas.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhil kitāba biquwwah ۖ wa-ātaynāhul ḥukma ṣabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَحَنَانًا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةً ۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: And tenderness from Us and purity, and he was one who guarded (against evil),
ayas.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakah ۖ wakāna taqiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّا
ayas.translation: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not insolent, disobedient.
ayas.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran `aṣiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
ayas.translation: And peace on him on the day he was born, and on the day he dies, and on the day he is raised to life
ayas.transliteration: wasalāmun `alayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamūtu wayawma yub`athu ḥayyā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا
ayas.translation: And mention Marium in the Book when she drew aside from her family to an eastern place;
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur fil kitābi maryama idhin-tabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًا سَوِيًّا
ayas.translation: So she took a veil (to screen herself) from them; then We sent to her Our spirit, and there appeared to her a well-made man.
ayas.transliteration: fattakhadhat min dūnihim ḥijāban fa-arsalnā ilayhā rūḥanā fatamathhala lahā basharan sawiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: She said: Surely I fly for refuge from you to the Beneficent Allah, if you are one guarding (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: qālat innī a`ūdhu bir raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًا زَكِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: I am only a messenger of your Lord: That I will give you a pure boy.
ayas.transliteration: qāla innamā ana rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا
ayas.translation: She said: When shall I have a boy and no mortal has yet touched me, nor have I been unchaste?
ayas.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ ۖ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةً مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًا مَّقْضِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: Even so; your Lord says: It is easy to Me: and that We may make him a sign to men and a mercy from Us, and it is a matter which has been decreed.
ayas.transliteration: qāla kadhāliki qāla rabbuki huwa `alayya hayyin ۖ walinaj`alahu āyatan linnāsi waraḥmatan minnā ۚ wakāna amran maqḍiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتْ بِهِۦ مَكَانًا قَصِيًّا
ayas.translation: So she conceived him; then withdrew herself with him to a remote place.
ayas.transliteration: faḥamalat-hu fantabadhat bihi makānan qaṣiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًا مَّنسِيًّا
ayas.translation: And the throes (of childbirth) compelled her to betake herself to the trunk of a palm tree. She said: Oh, would that I had died before this, and had been a thing quite forgotten!
ayas.transliteration: fa-ajā-ahal makhāḍu ilā jidh`in nakhlati qālat yālaytanī mittu qabla hādhā wakuntu nasyan mansiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا
ayas.translation: Then (the child) called out to her from beneath her: Grieve not, surely your Lord has made a stream to flow beneath you;
ayas.transliteration: fanādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad ja`ala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyā

ayas.arabic: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًا جَنِيًّا
ayas.translation: And shake towards you the trunk of the palmtree, it will drop on you fresh ripe dates:
ayas.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh`in nakhlati tusāqiṭ `alayki ruṭaban janiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَكُلِى وَٱشْرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيْنًا ۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلْبَشَرِ أَحَدًا فَقُولِىٓ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ صَوْمًا فَلَنْ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنسِيًّا
ayas.translation: So eat and drink and refresh the eye. Then if you see any mortal, say: Surely I have vowed a fast to the Beneficent Allah, so I shall not speak to any man today.
ayas.transliteration: fakulī washrabī waqarrī `aynā ۖ fa-immā tarayinna minal bashari aḥadan faqūlī innī nadhartu lirraḥmāni ṣawman falan ukallimal yawma insiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَأَتَتْ بِهِۦ قَوْمَهَا تَحْمِلُهُۥ ۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ لَقَدْ جِئْتِ شَيْـًٔا فَرِيًّا
ayas.translation: And she came to her people with him, carrying him (with her). They said: O Marium! surely you have done a strange thing.
ayas.transliteration: fa-atat bihi qawmahā taḥmiluh ۖ qālū yāmaryamu laqad ji-ti shay-an fariyyā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ هَـٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّا
ayas.translation: O sister of Haroun! your father was not a bad man, nor, was your mother an unchaste woman.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ukhta hārūna mā kāna abūkim-ra-a saw-in wa mā kānat ummuki baghiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا
ayas.translation: But she pointed to him. They said: How should we speak to one who was a child in the cradle?
ayas.transliteration: fa-ashārat ilayh ۖ qālū kayfa nukallimu man kāna fil mahdi ṣabiyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: Surely I am a servant of Allah; He has given me the Book and made me a prophet;
ayas.transliteration: qāla innī `abdullāhi ātāniyal kitāba waja`alanī nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوْصَـٰنِى بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمْتُ حَيًّا
ayas.translation: And He has made me blessed wherever I may be, and He has enjoined on me prayer and poor-rate so long as I live;
ayas.transliteration: waja`alanī mubārakan ayna mā kuntu wa-awṣānī biṣ ṣalāti waz zakāti mā dumtu ḥayyā

ayas.arabic: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِى وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْنِى جَبَّارًا شَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: And dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me insolent, unblessed;
ayas.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yaj`alnī jabbāran shaqiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
ayas.translation: And peace on me on the day I was born, and on the day I die, and on the day I am raised to life.
ayas.transliteration: was salāmu `alayya yawma wulidtu wayawma amūtu wayawma ub`athu ḥayyā

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Such is Isa, son of Marium; (this is) the saying of truth about which they dispute.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika `īsab-nu maryam ۚ qawlal-ḥaqqil ladhī fīhi yamtarūn

ayas.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٍ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayas.translation: It beseems not Allah that He should take to Himself a son, glory to be Him; when He has decreed a matter He only says to it "Be," and it is.
ayas.transliteration: mā kāna lillāhi an yattakhidha min walad ۖ subḥānah ۚ idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore serve Him; this is the right path.
ayas.transliteration: wa innallāha rabbī warabbukum fa`budūh ۚ hādhā ṣirāṭun mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن مَّشْهَدِ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: But parties from among them disagreed with each other, so woe to those who disbelieve, because of presence on a great day.
ayas.transliteration: fakhtalafal-aḥzābu min baynihim ۖ fawaylul lilladhīna kafarū min mash-hadi yawmin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ وَأَبْصِرْ يَوْمَ يَأْتُونَنَا ۖ لَـٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: How clearly shall they hear and how clearly shall they see on the day when they come to Us; but the unjust this day are in manifest error.
ayas.transliteration: asmi` bihim wa-abṣir yawma ya-tūnanā ۖ lākiniẓ ẓālimūnal yawma fī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: And warn them of the day of intense regret, when the matter shall have been decided; and they are (now) in negligence and they do not believe.
ayas.transliteration: wa-andhirhum yawmal ḥasrati idh quḍiyal-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Surely We inherit the earth and all those who are on it, and to Us they shall be returned.
ayas.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithul-arḍa wa man `alayhā wa ilaynā yurja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
ayas.translation: And mention Ibrahim in the Book; surely he was a truthful man, a prophet.
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur fil kitābi ibrāhīm ۚ innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًٔا
ayas.translation: When he said to his father; O my father! why do you worship what neither hears nor sees, nor does it avail you in the least:
ayas.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi yā-abati lima ta`budu mā lā yasma`u walā yubṣiru walā yughnī `anka shay-ā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًا سَوِيًّا
ayas.translation: O my father! truly the knowledge has come to me which has not come to you, therefore follow me, I will guide you on a right path:
ayas.transliteration: yā-abati innī qad jā-anī minal `il-mi mā lam ya-tika fattabi`nī ahdika ṣirāṭan sawiyyā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا
ayas.translation: O my father! serve not the Shaitan, surely the Shaitan is disobedient to the Beneficent Allah:
ayas.transliteration: yā-abati lā ta`budish shayṭān ۖ innash shayṭāna kāna lirraḥmāni `aṣiyyā

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيًّا
ayas.translation: O my father! surely I fear that a punishment from the Beneficent Allah should afflict you so that you should be a friend of the Shaitan.
ayas.transliteration: yā-abati innī akhāfu an yamassaka `adhābun minar raḥmāni fatakūna lishhayṭāni waliyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: Do you dislike my gods, O Ibrahim? If you do not desist I will certainly revile you, and leave me for a time.
ayas.transliteration: qāla arāghibun anta `an ālihatī yā-ibrāhīm ۖ la-in lam tantahi la-arjumannak ۖ wāhjurnī maliyyā

ayas.arabic: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا
ayas.translation: He said: Peace be on you, I will pray to my Lord to forgive you; surely He is ever Affectionate to me:
ayas.transliteration: qāla salāmun `alayk ۖ sa-astaghfiru laka rabbī ۖ innahu kāna bī ḥafiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: And I will withdraw from you and what you call on besides Allah, and I will call upon my Lord; may be I shall not remain unblessed in calling upon my Lord.
ayas.transliteration: wa-a`tazilukum wa mā tad`ūna min dūnillāhi wa-ad`ū rabbī `asā allā akūna bidu`ā-i rabbī shaqiyyā

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّا
ayas.translation: So when he withdrew from them and what they worshipped besides Allah, We gave to him Ishaq and Yaqoub, and each one of them We made a prophet.
ayas.transliteration: falamma'-tazalahum wa mā ya`budūna min dūnillāhi wahabnā lahu is-ḥāqa waya`qūb ۖ wakullan ja`alnā nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّا
ayas.translation: And We granted to them of Our mercy, and We left (behind them) a truthful mention of eminence for them.
ayas.transliteration: wawahabnā lahum min raḥmatinā waja`alnā lahum lisāna ṣidqin `aliyyā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًا وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
ayas.translation: And mention Musa in the Book; surely he was one purified, and he was an apostle, a prophet.
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur fil kitābi mūsā ۚ innahu kāna mukhlaṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّا
ayas.translation: And We called to him from the blessed side of the mountain, and We made him draw nigh, holding communion (with Us).
ayas.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibiṭ ṭūril-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا
ayas.translation: And We gave to him out of Our mercy his brother Haroun a prophet.
ayas.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
ayas.translation: And mention Ismail in the Book; surely he was truthful in (his) promise, and he was an apostle, a prophet.
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur fil kitābi ismā`īl ۚ innahu kāna ṣādiqal wa`di wakāna rasūlan nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّا
ayas.translation: And he enjoined on his family prayer and almsgiving, and was one in whom his Lord was well pleased.
ayas.transliteration: wakāna ya-muru ahlahu biṣ ṣalāti waz zakāti wakāna `inda rabbihi marḍiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
ayas.translation: And mention Idris in the Book; surely he was a truthful man, a prophet,
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur fil kitābi idrīs ۚ innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
ayas.translation: And We raised him high in Heaven.
ayas.transliteration: warafa`nāhu makānan `aliyyā

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَبُكِيًّا ۩
ayas.translation: These are they on whom Allah bestowed favors, from among the prophets of the seed of Adam, and of those whom We carried with Nuh, and of the seed of Ibrahim and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose; when the communications of the Beneficent Allah were recited to them, they fell down making obeisance and weeping.
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ikal ladhīna an`amallāhu `alayhim minan nabiyyīna min dhurriyyati ādama wa mimman ḥamalnā ma`a nūḥin wa min dhurriyyati ibrāhīma wa isrā-iyla wa mimman hadaynā wajtabaynā ۚ idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātur raḥmāni kharrū sujjadan wabukiyyā ۩

ayas.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا
ayas.translation: But there came after them an evil generation, who neglected prayers and followed and sensual desires, so they win meet perdition,
ayas.transliteration: fakhalafa min ba`dihim khalfun aḍā`uṣ ṣalāta wattaba`ush shahawāt ۖ fasawfa yalqawna ghayyā

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا
ayas.translation: Except such as repent and believe and do good, these shall enter the garden, and they shall not be dealt with unjustly in any way:
ayas.transliteration: illā man tāba wa-āmana wa`amila ṣāliḥan fa-ulā-ika yadkhulūnal jannata walā yuẓlamūna shay-ā

ayas.arabic: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّا
ayas.translation: The gardens of perpetuity which the Beneficent Allah has promised to His servants while unseen; surely His promise shall come to pass.
ayas.transliteration: jannāti `adninil latī wa`adar raḥmānu `ibādahu bil ghayb ۚ innahu kāna wa`duhu ma-tiyyā

ayas.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
ayas.translation: They shall not hear therein any vain discourse, but only: Peace, and they shall have their sustenance therein morning and evening.
ayas.transliteration: lā yasma`ūna fīhā laghwan illā salāmā ۖ walahum rizquhum fīhā bukratan wa`ashiyyā

ayas.arabic: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا
ayas.translation: This is the garden which We cause those of Our servants to inherit who guard (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: tilkal jannatul latī nūrithu min `ibādinā man kāna taqiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا
ayas.translation: And we do not descend but by the command of your Lord; to Him belongs whatever is before us and whatever is behind us and whatever is between these, and your Lord is not forgetful.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā natanazzalu illā bi-amri rabbik ۖ lahu mā bayna aydīnā wa mā khalfanā wa mā bayna dhālik ۚ wa mā kāna rabbuka nasiyyā

ayas.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا
ayas.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, so serve Him and be patient in His service. Do you know any one equal to Him?
ayas.transliteration: rabbus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā fa`bud-hu waṣṭabir li`ibādatih ۚ hal ta`lamu lahu samiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
ayas.translation: And says man: What! when I am dead shall I truly be brought forth alive?
ayas.transliteration: wayaqūlul-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukhraju ḥayyā

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًٔا
ayas.translation: Does not man remember that We created him before, when he was nothing?
ayas.transliteration: awalā yadhkurul-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shay-ā

ayas.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا
ayas.translation: So by your Lord! We will most certainly gather them together and the Shaitans, then shall We certainly cause them to be present round hell on their knees.
ayas.transliteration: fawarabbika lanaḥshurannahum wash shayāṭīna thumma lanuḥḍirannahum ḥawla jahannama jithiyyā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّا
ayas.translation: Then We will most certainly draw forth from every sect of them him who is most exorbitantly rebellious against the Beneficent Allah.
ayas.transliteration: thumma lananzi`anna min kulli shī`atin ayyuhum ashaddu `alar raḥmāni `itiyyā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا
ayas.translation: Again We do certainly know best those who deserve most to be burned therein.
ayas.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu a`lamu bil ladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyā

ayas.arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا
ayas.translation: And there is not one of you but shall come to it; this is an unavoidable decree of your Lord.
ayas.transliteration: wa in minkum illā wāriduhā ۚ kāna `alā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyā

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا
ayas.translation: And We will deliver those who guarded (against evil), and We will leave the unjust therein on their knees.
ayas.transliteration: thumma nunajjil ladhīnat-taqaw wanadharuẓ ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا
ayas.translation: And when Our clear communications are recited to them, those who disbelieve say to those who believe: Which of the two parties is best in abiding and best in assembly?
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin qālal ladhīna kafarū lilladhīna āmanū ayyul farīqayni khayrun maqāman wa-aḥsanu nadiyyā

ayas.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَـٰثًا وَرِءْيًا
ayas.translation: And how many of the generations have We destroyed before them who were better in respect of goods and outward appearance!
ayas.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari-yā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا
ayas.translation: Say: As for him who remains in error, the Beneficent Allah will surely prolong his length of days, until they see what they were threatened with, either the punishment or the hour; then they shall know who is in more evil plight and weaker in forces
ayas.transliteration: qul man kāna fiḍ ḍalālati falyamdud lahur raḥmānu maddā ۚ ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yū`adūna immal `adhāba wa immas sā`ata fasaya`lamūna man huwa sharrun makānan wa-aḍ`afu jundā

ayas.arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًى ۗ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا
ayas.translation: And Allah increases in guidance those who go aright; and ever-abiding good works are with your Lord best in recompense and best in yielding fruit.
ayas.transliteration: wayazīdullāhul ladhīnah-tadaw hudā ۗ wal bāqiyātuṣ ṣāliḥātu khayrun `inda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun maraddā

ayas.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
ayas.translation: Have you, then, seen him who disbelieves in Our communications and says: I shall certainly be given wealth and children?
ayas.transliteration: afara aytal ladhī kafara bi-āyātinā waqāla la-ūtayanna mālan wawaladā

ayas.arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
ayas.translation: Has he gained knowledge of the unseen, or made a covenant with the Beneficent Allah?
ayas.transliteration: aṭṭala`al ghayba amit-takhadha `indar raḥmāni `ahdā

ayas.arabic: كَلَّا ۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّا
ayas.translation: By no means! We write down what he says, and We will lengthen to him the length of the chastisement
ayas.transliteration: kallā ۚ sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu minal `adhābi maddā

ayas.arabic: وَنَرِثُهُۥ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا
ayas.translation: And We will inherit of him what he says, and he shall come to Us alone.
ayas.transliteration: wanarithuhu mā yaqūlu waya-tīnā fardā

ayas.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا
ayas.translation: And they have taken gods besides Allah, that they should be to them a source of strength;
ayas.transliteration: wattakhadhū min dūnillāhi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum `izzā

ayas.arabic: كَلَّا ۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
ayas.translation: By no means! They shall soon deny their worshipping them, and they shall be adversaries to them.
ayas.transliteration: kallā ۚ sayakfurūna bi`ibādatihim wayakūnūna `alayhim ḍiddā

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا
ayas.translation: Do you not see that We have sent the Shaitans against the unbelievers, inciting them by incitement?
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnash shayāṭīna `alal-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzā

ayas.arabic: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
ayas.translation: Therefore be not in haste against them, We only number out to them a number (of days).
ayas.transliteration: falā ta`jal `alayhim ۖ innamā na`uddu lahum `addā

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًا
ayas.translation: The day on which We will gather those who guard (against evil) to the Beneficent Allah to receive honors
ayas.transliteration: yawma naḥshurul muttaqīna ilar raḥmāni wafdā

ayas.arabic: وَنَسُوقُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًا
ayas.translation: And We will drive the guilty to hell thirsty
ayas.transliteration: wanasūqul mujrimīna ilā jahannama wirdā

ayas.arabic: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
ayas.translation: They shall not control intercession, save he who has made a covenant with the Beneficent Allah.
ayas.transliteration: lā yamlikūnash shafā`ata illā manit-takhadha `indar raḥmāni `ahdā

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا
ayas.translation: And they say: The Beneficent Allah has taken (to Himself) a son.
ayas.transliteration: waqālut-takhadhar raḥmānu waladā

ayas.arabic: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِدًّا
ayas.translation: Certainly you have made an abominable assertion
ayas.transliteration: laqad ji-tum shay-an iddā

ayas.arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
ayas.translation: The heavens may almost be rent thereat, and the earth cleave asunder, and the mountains fall down in pieces,
ayas.transliteration: takādus samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna minhu watanshaqqul-arḍu watakhirrul jibālu haddā

ayas.arabic: أَن دَعَوْا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدًا
ayas.translation: That they ascribe a son to the Beneficent Allah.
ayas.transliteration: an da`aw lirraḥmāni waladā

ayas.arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
ayas.translation: And it is not worthy of the Beneficent Allah that He should take (to Himself) a son.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā yanbaghī lirraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladā

ayas.arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًا
ayas.translation: There is no one in the heavens and the earth but will come to the Beneficent Allah as a servant.
ayas.transliteration: in kullu man fis samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātir raḥmāni `abdā

ayas.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىٰهُمْ وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّا
ayas.translation: Certainly He has a comprehensive knowledge of them and He has numbered them a (comprehensive) numbering.
ayas.transliteration: laqad aḥṣāhum wa`addahum `addā

ayas.arabic: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَرْدًا
ayas.translation: And every one of them will come to Him on the day of resurrection alone.
ayas.transliteration: wakulluhum ātīhi yawmal qiyāmati fardā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
ayas.translation: Surely (as for) those who believe and do good deeds for them will Allah bring about love.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti sayaj`alu lahumur raḥmānu wuddā

ayas.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا
ayas.translation: So We have only made it easy in your tongue that you may give good news thereby to those who guard (against evil) and warn thereby a vehemently contentious people.
ayas.transliteration: fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashhira bihil muttaqīna watundhira bihi qawmal luddā

ayas.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًۢا
ayas.translation: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them! Do you see any one of them or hear a sound of them?
ayas.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hal tuḥissu minhum min aḥadin aw tasma`u lahum rikzā
